actionroutine.name: pcont
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine adds contours to a plot. Its parameters control the plotting of isolines and high/low markers.

actionroutine.name: pcoast
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine adds coastlines to a plot. Its parameters control the plotting of coastlines and latitude/longitude grids and labels.

actionroutine.name: pwind
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine adds wind symbols to a plot. Its parameters control all aspects of wind plotting.

actionroutine.name: pobs
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine adds observation symbols to a plot.

actionroutine.name: psymb
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine adds symbols to a plot.

actionroutine.name: pgraph
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine plots graphs such as curves.

actionroutine.name: pboxplot
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine plots boxplots.

actionroutine.name: ptaylor
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine plots Taylor diagrams.

actionroutine.name: pline
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine plots (optionally filled) polylines over geographical areas.

actionroutine.name: ptext
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine adds text to a plot. Its parameters control all aspects of the text, whether it is for titles or annotations.

actionroutine.name: pimage
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine controls the plotting of satellite images.

actionroutine.name: pnew(SUPER_PAGE)
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine controls the superpage layout.

actionroutine.name: pnew(PAGE)
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine controls the page layout.

actionroutine.name: pnew(SUBPAGE)
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine controls the subpage layout.

actionroutine.name: pnetcdf
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine controls the handling of netcdf files.

actionroutine.name: pgrib
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine controls the handling of grib data.

actionroutine.name: paxis
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine controls the plotting of axes

actionroutine.name: pmetgram
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine plots a classic metgram.

actionroutine.name: peps
actionroutine.documentation: This action routine plots an EPS metgram.

actionroutine.name: legend
actionroutine.documentation: These parameters control the plotting of legends.

actionroutine.name: input_matrix
actionroutine.documentation: Parameters to set input data.
